citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on
07September2023. The inspector honked the vehicle's horn multiple times over several minutes. The inspector was
unable to exit the vehicle due to a loose pit bull dog circling and barking at the inspector's car. The inspector then called
the registrant, who answered the phone. The registrant stated that they were not in NC at this time. The inspector
departed the premises at 12:00 pm.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 am on 
07September2023. The inspector honked the vehicle's horn multiple times over several minutes. The inspector was 
unable to exit the vehicle due to a loose pit bull dog circling and barking at the inspector's car. The inspector then called 
the registrant, who answered the phone. The registrant stated that they were not in NC at this time. The inspector 
departed the premises at 12:00 pm. 
 
 
End Section
